system.requirement: If you wield a star-headed mace...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} to knock a foe back, stun them, or push them off balance, inflict 1 harm (instead of 2) and take +2 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit, you create an opening and add +1 to your next move.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} and your total action value is 3 or more greater than both challenge dice, treat the strong hit as if it was a strong hit with a match.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.be95ca063ded2b19]{Compel}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger}, or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by hitting or breaking an inanimate object, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
